## Correlogram

```{r}
library(corrplot)
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)

dataP<-read_excel("/Users/e5028514/Downloads/Equity group analysis.xlsx")%>%select(-1)
corrplot(as.matrix(dataP), is.corr = FALSE, tl.pos='n', 
         col = COL2('RdBu', 10),
         type = 'upper',
         cl.pos = 'n')

```
